author.name: Raymond T. Hightower - Chicago Ruby on Rails & iOS Developer

entry.title: PechaKucha: Developer Education at TableXI
entry.content:
PechaKucha is a concise presentation style developed in Japan. The PechaKucha format is 20x20: The presenter must share an idea in twenty slides, each displayed for exactly twenty seconds, advancing automatically. Total presentation time = six minutues, forty seconds.

TableXI hosted a PechaKucha on June 13th with the theme Developer Education. I was one of six presenters invited to speak. Video appears below:

One highlight from the PechaKucha presentation: This year's WindyCityRails will include a youth program on Thursday afternoon. Details will be announced in July. Follow @WindyCityRails for the latest news on the program.

Thanks TableXI for the PechaKucha invitation, and for sponsoring WindyCityRails 2013!
